name: English
descriptions: The English minor develops close reading, critical thinking, and persuasive writing skills through the study of literature and language. Students take 18 hours with 12 at the upper-division level.
Distribution requirements ensure breadth across American and British literature traditions. Excludes ENGL 10803 and ENGL 20803.

courses: 3 hours from the American Literature subcategory
3 hours from the British Literature subcategory

electiveCourses.description: 12 additional hours of English courses. Total of 12 hours must be upper-division. ENGL 10803 and ENGL 20803 do not count.
